direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add a configuration element (ValidatorAction or FormSet) to the resource, handling potential overrides and logging.
Both methods add a named element (ValidatorAction or Constant) to the resource, with similar logging and handling.
The processForms method processes FormSets, which are related to ValidatorActions as they both contribute to the validation configuration.
The getValidatorAction method retrieves a ValidatorAction by name, which is directly related to the addValidatorAction method that adds ValidatorActions.
The initDigester method initializes the Digester used for parsing XML configurations, which is a dependency for methods that handle ValidatorActions and FormSets.
Both methods access and manipulate validation resources (ValidatorActions and Forms) based on locale and other criteria.
Both methods access and manipulate validation resources (ValidatorActions and FormSets) based on locale and other criteria.
The getActions method retrieves the map of ValidatorActions, which is directly related to the addValidatorAction method that adds ValidatorActions.
The getConstants method retrieves the map of constants, which might be used in conjunction with ValidatorActions during validation.
The getFormSets method retrieves the map of FormSets, which are related to ValidatorActions as they both contribute to the validation configuration.
